forecast.name: Today
forecast.detailedForecast: Mostly sunny. High near 56, with temperatures falling to around 53 in the afternoon. Northwest wind around 7 mph.

forecast.name: Tonight
forecast.detailedForecast: Mostly clear, with a low around 44. North wind 3 to 7 mph.

weather_report:
This morning, Downtown San Francisco awakens under a canopy of mostly sunny skies, infused with a crispness that hints at the gentle change of seasons. The city breathes quietly at first light, high clouds retreating before the soft caress of the sun, which will reach a high around fifty-six degrees. The air remains pleasantly cool, tapering to about fifty-three by afternoon as a gentle northwest breeze carries the scent of the bay, rustling through the trees lining the streets.

As daylight unfolds, the horizon appears untroubled, with visibility stretching towards the grandeur of the Golden Gate Bridge, unmarred by fog or the typical coastal haze. Tonight, the sky will transition to a clear canvas, with temperatures gracefully falling to around forty-four, inviting you to savor a calm evening stroll. It’s a day meant for comfortable layers—a light jacket paired with a cozy scarf to make the most of brisk moments outside, whether you find yourself at a café soaking in a cup of coffee or exploring the quiet corners of Golden Gate Park. The city beckons you to wander, to immerse in its understated charm, to take a slow walk along its waterfront, or simply to enjoy the tranquil rhythm of another San Francisco day.
